Recorded at Media Studios, New York, NY Mixed at Power Station & Media Studios, New York, NY Mastered at Sterling Sound, New York, NY A1, A3: Little Macho Music Co., Inc./Crystal Eyes Publishing Co./ASCAP/BMI A2: Little Macho Music Co., Inc./Pizzazz Music/ASCAP/BMI A4: Little Macho Music Co., Inc./G.S.
